title: When to cut nails & hair if my udhiya / Qurbani is done abroad & I don't know when it's done? Assim
transcript: accent from the uk says i usually offer my qrbani or abroad so in poor countries that need the food more than we do so i send it to yemen to syria to bangladesh to the rohingya to here and there now i don't know when these uh charity organizations will do the slaughtering so what to do when i have refrained the 10 days from clipping my nails and trimming my hair if you don't know then you assume after praying your eight prayer in your country inshaallah that they have done it and you can remove that inshallah
